title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: Cron Configuration
description: Defines the cron schedule for when this cleanup job should run automatically. This job runs daily at 2:00 AM.

title: Cron Job Handler
description: The handler that runs on the scheduled interval to clean up old soft-deleted pets.

title: Data Scanning
description: Scans the pet store for pets that have been soft-deleted and are ready for permanent removal.

title: Cleanup Logic
description: Implements the logic for permanently removing pets that have passed their purge date.

title: Logging
description: Logs the cleanup activities for monitoring and audit purposes.

title: Error Handling
description: Handles errors gracefully during the cleanup process to ensure system stability.
